The next generation of virtual event technology

What is Event Labs?

Event labs is a research and innovation initiative bringing together a multidisciplinary team of technology and industry professionals to pioneer the next generation of virtual event technology

Features

Real-time remote video participation

Increased audience participation and immersion during livestreaming events, largescale livestream virtual events, hybrid events or live virtual Q&A

EXPLORE

Live audience reactions

Increase audience participation during livestraming events with reactions and sentiment analysis. Get social and fun responses to increase the feeling of a shared experience between attendees.

EXPLORE

Virtual networking tables

The virtual networking tables provide a fun, no/training required, attendee/controlled interface that allows attendees to freely move between small groups for interactive video discussions.

EXPLORE

Start creating events now

Get access to the demo and take your virtual events to the next level
